sentence.Network_en: Dark sand gathered like black flour under the sandwort bushes.
sentence.Network_cn: 在沙洼地上,每丛沙蓬下部集拢了一堆像黑面粉一样的褐色细沙尘.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 小小的蚤缀(sandwort)便是这样,在羽扇豆为最贫瘠的山丘顶泼洒蓝色之前, 它们便为.
boreal or alpine sandwort .北方高山地区的一种石竹科植物。
sandwichtype 夹心型, sandwort 鹅不食, sandwort 蚤缀属
sandwichtype 夹层式, sandwort 蚤缀属, sandwichtype 夹心型

list.abs: 雪矾 alum雪灵芝 Gansu sandwort章 | same as 樟 {zhang1}, camphor

means.word_mean: 1. loosely matted plant with mosslike foliage studded with tiny starry 4-petaled white blossoms; mountains of central and southern Europe
2. low-growing herb having clusters of small white-flowers 4-petaled flowers
3. low-growing chiefly perennial plants usually with small white flowers suitable for e.g. rock gardens
